question: I have a beard but you can see the skin underneathe does this area have to be washed during wudu
answer:
QUESTION
I have a beard but you can see the skin underneathe does this area have to be washed during wudu and how should this area be washed.Also is it minor shirk to say I should have done this when speaking about the past?
ANSWER


Share:
In principle, if a person has a sparse beard, it is necessary for water to reach the skin of the face. (Fataawa Mahmoodiyah vol.9 pg.50)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
